Command.name: JavaScript
Command.label: 裁剪成 LNCS
Command.tooltip: 执行 JavaScript，页面裁剪成 LNCS（430x660）

Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: /* Acrobat Action Script: change PDF crop box to 430x660pt (in the center of all pages) Author: Chun Tian (binghe) <binghe.lisp@gmail.com> Date: November 25, 2018 Version: 1.0 */ /* this is LNCS paper size: */ var wLNCS = 430; /* units in pt */ var hLNCS = 660; /* units in pt */ for (var i = 0; i < this.numPages; i++) { /* get the crop box size from the current page (in case pages have different sizes */ var rect = this.getPageBox("Crop", i); /* rect: [left, top, right, bot] */ /* get the current page width and height */ var width = rect[2] - rect[0]; /* right - left */ var height = rect[1] - rect[3]; /* top - bot */ /* do it only if the page size is bigger than LNCS paper size */ if (width > wLNCS && height > hLNCS) { var diffX = (width - wLNCS) / 2; var diffY = (height - hLNCS) / 2; var left = rect[0] + diffX; var top = rect[1] - diffY; var right = rect[2] - diffX; var bot = rect[3] + diffY; this.setPageBoxes("Crop", i, i, [left, top, right, bot]); } }
